Description: BLACK Epiphone Les Paul Junior Model Electric 6 String Guitar Gently used please see pictures as part of description has scratches and knicks. see pictures. Product InformationElectric Guitar Mahogany Solid-Body Epiphone Les Paul Junior Vintage SunburstEpiphone Junior Single Cutaway in Vintage Sunburst with Cream pickup rings and chrome hardware. With the Les Paul styling combined with an amazing finish makes the LP Junior Special an incredible guitar.Epiphone Les Paul JuniorA Les Paul at a price anyone can afford.The Les Paul Junior was first introduced at Epiphone’s legendary Kalamazoo factory in 1954 and was intended as an affordable way for beginners to get the look, sound, and feel of a real Les Paul. However, the Les Paul Junior quickly became a legend of its own. Throughout the years and in all its many incarnations, the Les Paul Junior has been an on-stage favorite for artists from all genres who embraced the Les Paul Junior for its lighter weight, commanding sound, and all-mahogany body. Today, the Epiphone Les Paul Junior is still the best way for beginners to get started on a full-size guitar with real vintage Les Paul tone. And if the Les Paul Junior’s rock and roll history wasn’t enough to convince you, check out Rocksmith, the breakthrough guitar video game which features the Epiphone Les Paul Junior as its go-to guitar!Body and neckThe Epiphone Les Paul Junior has a Mahogany body and Mahogany neck with a 1960s Slim Taper profile, a Rosewood fingerboard, and Pearloid dot inlays.Pickups and electronicsThe Epiphone Les Paul Junior features an Epiphone 700T Humbucker and a Master Volume and Master Tone control.HardwareThe Epiphone Les Paul Junior comes with a combination Epiphone wrap-around Stop Bar bridge and tailpiece as well as Nickel hardware and Epiphone Premium Die-cast 14:1 ratio tuners.About EpiphoneFor over 140 years, Epiphone has led the world in innovative musical instrument designs. Epiphone is home to the PRO-1 Collection, designed by Pros to be easy to play. Epiphone is also the official instrument maker for Rocksmith, the critically acclaimed video experience that’s teaching millions around the world how to play guitar and bass. Since Epiphone’s humble beginnings in Greece in 1873 through its rise to fame in New York, and its reemergence as a dominant force in musical instrument making from its new headquarters in Nashville, Epiphones have been making history around the world. Epiphone instruments are heard on hundreds of classic recordings by Les Paul, The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, The Kinks, John Lee Hooker, Oasis, and today’s top artists like Gary Clark Jr., Jack Casady, Joe Bonamassa, Dwight Yoakam, Tommy Thayer of KISS, Slash, Robb Flynn, Matt Heafy, Alabama Shakes, Tony Iommi of Black Sabbath, and Brendon Small. As part of Gibson Brands, Epiphone offers innovation, history.THANKS FOR LOOKING
Title: BLACK Epiphone Les Paul Junior Model Electric 6 String Guitar gently used
